title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Centers       Whether you are seeking information on Jimmy Carter or searching for information on the history of the area, you will want to visit one or more of the visitor centers in the area.  There are several local visitor center in the area that offer information on local attractions and local history. There is a state run visitor information center located at the city limits of Plains that can provide information on other state parks and state run information centers in Georgia. Click the following links for more information.  Georgia Tourism   Americus/Sumter County Welcome Center   Plains Welcome Center
